item.title: FBI launches Tesla threats task force: 'This is domestic terrorism'
item.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk and his DOGE team are leading efforts by the Trump administration to drastically cut federal government spending and staff.

item.title: Trump pledges auto, pharma tariffs in 'near future,' sowing more trade confusion
item.description: President Donald Trump has praised tariffs and announced an array of import duties on specific countries and products since taking office.

item.title: Previously classified files related to JFK assassination released
item.description: Previously classified documents related to the 1963 assassination of President John F. Kennedy were released Tuesday following an order by President D...

item.title: Tesla showroom in Texas targeted with 'incendiary devices', police say
item.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk attended a Cabinet meeting at the White House with President Donald Trump as news of the incident broke.

item.title: Political and financial turmoil set to dominate Turkey, risking economic stabilization plans
item.description: "Once again, President Erdogan's political agenda has inflicted serious damage on Turkey's economic outlook," one analyst note read.
